transferCurrencyAsset(bytes4,uint256).return: boolean to represent success or failure

transferEther(uint256,address).details: Sends a given amount of Ether to a given address.
transferEther(uint256,address).return: succ True if transfer is a success, otherwise False.

upgradeCapitalPool(address).details: Transfers all assest (i.e ETH balance, Currency Assest) from old Pool to new Pool
